about.title: About us
about.visionMissionText:
In Switzerland, more than 150 million kilometers are driven by car every day. At the same time, the cars are often barely loaded: On average, only 1.6 people sit in each vehicle and the increasingly large trunks are mostly empty.

Portato has set itself the goal of making better use of these many free transport capacities. Every carpool potentially avoids another transport trip and means one less car on the road. Our vision is to thus make road transport more efficient and make a positive contribution to the environment.

Our immediate mission is to facilitate carpooling between private individuals. On the one hand, this makes it more convenient to ship (bulky) items. On the other hand, we enable drivers to use their free space wisely, earning money in the process and reducing their ecological footprint.
about.whoWeAreText: At Portato, innovation meets the open road! We are a lively fusion of thinkers, tinkerers, and pioneers with the common goal of revolutionizing transport!

Conrad.name: Conrad
Conrad.description: Our resident PowerPoint sorcerer and Excel wizard, Conrad ditched the daily grind to become Portato's CEO. He sports a gym membership, a bursting contact book, and a party spirit. Fiercely soft yet effectively hard-hitting.

Hugo.name: Hugo
Hugo.description: The Franco-British engineering maestro with thoughts so fast, they've got a sonic boom. Hugo can charm you in two languages while programming the backend in three. His fingers fly over the keyboard, casting spells that make everything tick.

Mehdi.name: Mehdi
Mehdi.description: Hip-hop, hipster, and Moroccan charm trifecta, Mehdi is our user experience guru. When he's not busy being a magnet for admiration, he's crafting code that makes the backend look as good as his haircuts.

Mischa.name: Mischa
Mischa.description: Jack of all trades and master of...well, everything! Mischa is the rare combination of a coder-designer-animator-rigger and follicular minimalist. Can flip between jiujitsu and JavaScript like nobody's business, all from the compact comfort of a Smart car.

Chiara.name: Chiara
Chiara.description: Storyboard scribe and 2D animation whizz, Chiara moonlights as a wannabe princess with the fiery spirit of a Latin dance. The magic behind our friendly faces, she infuses Portato with charm, one frame at a time.
